metadata.title: CVE-2024-46657 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Artifex Software mupdf v1.24.9 was discovered to contain a segmentationfault via the component /tools/pdfextract.c. This vulnerability allowsattackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
